name: DualiKey
description:
2 player local  Co-Op or solo, take control of Yander and Yindo in this short puzzle solver

 Take turns to alternate between your physical and spectral forms, activating symbols and casting a veil of light or dark to reveal what's hidden. Work together to identify the symbols that link with the key, so you can move forward in your journey.

A short puzzle game with cute hats. Loop through the various rooms to solve the thematic puzzles together in this single keyboard local co-op game.

 

Controls:

Player 1 - 

Movement = W, A, S, D

Interact = E

Player 2 - 

Movement = Arrow Keys

Interact = Right Control

Made as part of the Black&White Jam 2022
